name: Shogi - (Japanese Chess)
description: A two-player strategy board game developed in C++, implementing the rules and gameplay of Shogi (Japanese Chess) with an interactive GUI for a seamless gaming experience.

name: Eatopia
description: A food ordering and delivery app developed in Flutter, providing users with a platform to explore nearby restaurants, view menus, place orders, and track deliveries in real-time.

name: WhatsApp Clone
description: Clone for whatsapp messenger application developed using Flutter. NodeJS used for backend and MongoDB to store user messages and Information
